name: places/ChIJH3S8Y3FZwokRtsume1Xt_bA
adrFormatAddress: 1865 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I was here several months ago and had a pleasant experience! Short wait time, the front staff had a pleasant demeanor (surprised at these other reviews about this), the place was clean and Dr.Volpe was nice, and he addressed my concerns to my satisfaction. Yes I would come here again.

text.text: I was here several months ago and had a pleasant experience! Short wait time, the front staff had a pleasant demeanor (surprised at these other reviews about this), the place was clean and Dr.Volpe was nice, and he addressed my concerns to my satisfaction. Yes I would come here again.

originalText.text:
I am saddened to have to provide a very poor review of this office.
I agree this is a great doctor. In Jan 2023 the office was listed in Zoc Doc has accepting Aetna CVS insurance. At the front desk , upon my arrival, a receptionist reviewed my information and confirmed that my insurance was accepted. I was later sent a bill for over $400 dollars for a out-of-network visit. Six months later I am still disputing this bill with both the insurance and Summit.

originalText.text: Don’t get carried away by the terrible attitude of the front desk staff. The doctor is great. Most of us come here for get better, just keep this in mind and don’t get bothered.

text.text: Don’t get carried away by the terrible attitude of the front desk staff. The doctor is great. Most of us come here for get better, just keep this in mind and don’t get bothered.

originalText.text: I made an appointment on zocdoc and day off I realize I never received confirmation from the office. I’m currently calling the office for the 5th time and just can’t get through. No one picks up the phone and the mailbox is full. I’m not sure if I even have this appointment. What is going on in this office?

No one picks up the phone and the mailbox is full. I’m not sure if I even have this appointment. What is going on in this office?

originalText.text: Fantastic doctor but awful time getting through the office for any support - we have had issues scheduling appointments, rx’s sent to the wrong pharmacy (hours away), and not receiving follow up information/next steps. My partner was told to come in the next day for help with post surgery information, came in, and doctor was not there. Have been trying to get paperwork for over a week and no response yet.
